title: Red Knots Behaviour & Movement
description: I won the ASAB council's choice award in the ASAB video contest held in Spring 2021, with this science communication video showing how researchers study the behaviour and movement of red knots, particularly the methods used for bird research, from capture to release and beyond

title: WATLAS Fieldwork on Griend
description: I made this video for NIOZ's outreach to show how the WATLAS team performs fieldwork in the Wadden Sea to track red knots

title: What's the third-person effect?
description: I made this knowledge clip as part of the Communicating Science with the Public university course. It is addressed to Dutch high school students and it aims at informing about what the third-person effect is, how it affects people and why it is relevant today
